heading: HB07808
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A MAGNA CARTA FOR THE STATISTICAL, CIVIL REGISTRATION AND PHILIPPINE IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM WORKERS OF THE PHILIPPINES, AUTHORIZING THE COLLECTION AND APPROPRIATION OF FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on POPULATION AND FAMILY RELATIONS since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07808
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A MAGNA CARTA FOR THE STATISTICAL, CIVIL REGISTRATION AND PHILIPPINE IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM WORKERS OF THE PHILIPPINES, AUTHORIZING THE COLLECTION AND APPROPRIATION OF FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Provides compensation and other benefits to all statistical, civil registration and PhilSys workers.
ALIAS NAME : “Magna Carta for the Statistical, Civil Registration and Philippine Identification System Workers
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALO, RON P., CALALANG, CIRIACO
DATE FILED : 2018-05-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-09-27)2. Hernandez (P.) (000 2018-12-18)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON POPULATION AND FAMILY RELATIONS ON 2018-07-30
